name: LILINHub
0:
”Alexa, ask device hub to turn garden light off.”
”Alexa, ask device hub to playback recorder at 2pm on yesterday.”
”Alexa, ask device hub to open garden gate.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: device hub
Developer Terms of Use
des:
LILINHub skill can control NVR for play NVR video 2:00AM last night, switch to a channel, switch to 16 view. Ask questions about how many motion activities last night of a NVR. Ask if my NVR is healthy. Other NVR operations of fast forward, fast rewind, live view, and playback with date & time are supported.

LILINHub skill can control IP cameras for turning a light on, turning a light off, opening a gate, and closing a gate via a digital relay. LILINHub is also able to check the status of an IP camera, if a light is off or a gate is close. LILINHub skill can recall a PTZ camera for preset positions or patrol mode.

For more information, contact sales person at www.meritlilin.com.
For technical support, contact lilin.zendesk.com.
